entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
